Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability for authorized humans and/or tools to access audit logs
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: LibreNMS provides access to logs and alerts, Windows event logs mentioned

Requirement Description: Provide programmatic read access to audit logs
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: LibreNMS API likely available, SNMP traps integrated (NET-2A-TC206)

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to support continuous monitoring
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: LibreNMS continuous monitoring with alerting (NET-2A-TC206, NET-2A-TC203)
